item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (284 points | 81 comments)
2. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (97 points | 42 comments)
3. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust (by showing me C++) (47 points | 8 comments)
4. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (130 points | 179 comments)
5. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (147 points | 50 comments)
6. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (285 points | 256 comments)
7. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (104 points | 49 comments)
8. The curse of knowing how, or; fixing everything (772 points | 339 comments)
9. Show HN: Sheet Music in Smart Glasses (78 points | 7 comments)
10. Show HN: Fast parser and generator for RSS, Atom, OPML and popular namespaces (6 points | 1 comment)
11. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (13 points | 2 comments)
12. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (46 points | 21 comments)
13. Curl: We still have not seen a single valid security report done with AI help (115 points | 38 comments)
14. Design and evaluation of a parrot-to-parrot video-calling system (2023) (109 points | 44 comments)
15. The Inchtuthil Nail Hoard (43 points | 8 comments)
16. Propositions as Types (2014) [pdf] (77 points | 38 comments)
17. Show HN: Reverse Pac-Man (31 points | 18 comments)
18. MTerrain: Optimized terrain system and editor for Godot (38 points | 4 comments)
19. An appeal to Apple from Anukari (290 points | 129 comments)
20. DoomArena: A Framework for Testing AI Agents Against Evolving Security Threats (6 points | 1 comment)
21. Evolving OpenAI's Structure (584 points | 626 comments)
22. Memory-safe sudo to become the default in Ubuntu (139 points | 136 comments)
23. Show HN: Real-time AI Voice Chat at ~500ms Latency (468 points | 198 comments)
24. Carolina Eyck, renowned superstar of the theremin (64 points | 51 comments)
25. Sneakers (1992) – 4K makeover sourced from the original camera negative (305 points | 216 comments)
26. Replacing Kubernetes with systemd (2024) (382 points | 278 comments)
27. Sea snail teeth top Kevlar, titanium as strongest material (2015) (97 points | 52 comments)
28. Taking the bite out of Lyme disease (126 points | 62 comments)
29. Critical CSS (175 points | 66 comments)
30. RK3588 – Implementing a Vectorscope for processing video in real time (38 points | 6 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
